actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Water Resources and Environment.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Water Resources and Environment

official_title: To modify the project for beach erosion control, Tybee Island, Georgia.
subjects: Federal aid to water resources development

summary.text: Modifies the project for beach erosion control at Tybee Island, Georgia, to include the northern end of Tybee Island, extending from the north terminal groin to the mouth of Lazaretto Creek, as a part of the project.

titles.title: To modify the project for beach erosion control, Tybee Island, Georgia.
